title: Valentine 3-page UI refresh to mirror reference styling and polish featured videos

requirements.summary: Align the 3-page Valentine site’s design system (colors, typography, spacing, component styling) to closely match the reference page without copying any copyrighted assets.
acceptanceCriteria: Landing, Videos, and Final Message pages present a cohesive visual system that matches the reference page’s overall layout and styling (colors, spacing, typographic scale, component shapes)
No third-party/copyrighted images, icons, or proprietary brand marks from the reference are copied directly into the new site
All user-facing text remains in English

file_operations.description: Refine global theme tokens (OKLCH variables), typographic defaults, and shared utility classes (e.g., section spacing, glass/blur surfaces) to mirror the reference’s overall look-and-feel while remaining original.

Create a reusable page layout wrapper that standardizes background treatment, centered content width, consistent vertical rhythm, and shared header/footer styling across all three pages. Use existing shadcn-ui primitives (e.g., Button) where needed; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Update Landing page structure to use the shared ValentineLayout, harmonize spacing/typography, and ensure decorative elements and card styling match the refined system using existing shadcn-ui components (Button, Textarea); verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Update Videos page styling to use the shared ValentineLayout and match the refined system (header hierarchy, card surfaces, borders/radius, spacing) using existing shadcn-ui components (Button, Input, Label); verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Update Final Message page styling to use the shared ValentineLayout and unify typography, spacing, and surface styling with the other pages using existing shadcn-ui components (Textarea); verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Revise the Videos page header and copy to clearly present a “Featured Videos” section while keeping the three provided MP4 URLs as the only video sources.
acceptanceCriteria: Videos page displays the section title exactly as: “Featured Videos”

The three embedded videos use these exact URLs as sources: https://image2url.com/r2/default/videos/1771095915401-63c93159-e8fd-4bbb-b597-ec2f0c851aae.mp4, https://image2url.com/r2/default/videos/1771096125343-9f368017-cf72-4a89-a32a-82afbda31671.mp4, https://image2url.com/r2/default/videos/1771096462549-283a08bb-3e21-4aed-bedc-66811ea1f837.mp4
No UI is present that allows local video file uploads or replacing the provided URLs

file_operations.description: Change the section header title to exactly “Featured Videos” and update surrounding English copy to describe the featured section. Ensure no controls are added that allow users to upload/replace video sources; keep the page as an embed-only viewer/editor for titles using existing shadcn-ui components (Input, Label, Button); verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Verify the three video slots continue to initialize with the exact provided MP4 URLs and are passed through unchanged to the Videos page (no proxying, no rewriting). Also ensure no additional video sources are introduced via UI wiring.

requirements.summary: Ensure the site is responsive and intuitive across devices with seamless navigation (Landing → Videos → Final Message) and an adaptive video grid/layout.
acceptanceCriteria: On small screens, videos are displayed in a single-column layout with readable headings and comfortable spacing
On larger screens, the videos use a multi-column/grid layout without overflow or clipped controls
Primary navigation controls remain easy to discover and activate on touch devices (no overlapping fixed elements blocking actions)
Videos remain playable with visible controls on Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge

file_operations.description: Add clear, touch-friendly navigation wiring for all steps (Landing → Videos → Final Message), including back/step navigation affordances. Adjust fixed-position UI (e.g., save control placement) to avoid overlapping primary actions on small screens using existing shadcn-ui Button styling where applicable; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a compact responsive step navigation component (Landing / Videos / Final Message) with accessible buttons and current-step indication. Compose existing shadcn-ui Button styles; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Replace any potentially obstructive fixed navigation controls with layout-based navigation that remains reachable on mobile (comfortable padding, no overlap with other fixed UI). Use existing shadcn-ui Button; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Update the video grid to adapt across breakpoints (single column on small screens; multi-column on larger screens) and ensure video controls never clip/overflow. Keep <video controls> visible and functional; use existing shadcn-ui components for surrounding UI; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add or wire navigation controls so users can move intuitively through the 3-page flow (including returning to previous steps) without relying on hidden gestures. Use existing shadcn-ui Button; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
